remarks: Append an element to a finite group sum, more general version of ~ gsumunsnd .  (Contributed by AV, 7-Oct-2019.)
statement:
gsumzunsnd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzunsnd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumzunsnd.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzunsnd.f $e |- F = ( k e. ( A u. { M } ) |-> X ) $.
gsumzunsnd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzunsnd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
gsumzunsnd.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzunsnd.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsumzunsnd.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. V ) $.
gsumzunsnd.d $e |- ( ph -> -. M e. A ) $.
gsumzunsnd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
gsumzunsnd.s $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> X = Y ) $.
gsumzunsnd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Y k $.
$d k ph $.
